subject: GDES
name: Design and Discontents
fullname: Design and its Discontents: Design, Society, Economy, and Culture
info: Secret history of modern, postmodern, and contemporary design. Principles and practices of designers who operate outside of main stream. Innovators, activists, cultural gadflies whose work challenges, provokes, and inspires. Context of economy, society, culture, and politics. Lecture, research, studio production. Written project proposals/reflections/blogging.

subject: GDES
name: Honors: Identity and Symbols
info: Representation of abstract ideas through symbols. Development of visual identity systems.

subject: GDES
name: Capstone Project
info: Individualizes honors experience by connecting aspects of major program with special academic interests.prereq: Graphic design honors

subject: GDES
name: Honors Thesis Studio & Writing
info: Research/design of comprehensive graphic design thesis project.

subject: GDES
name: Senior Thesis and Exhibition
info: Design, production, and exhibition of comprehensive graphic design thesis project.
